replies.bodyText: @utle the goal of this code block is to ensure that a GSSCredential is associated with the Subject after the method exits, because the JDBC code expects to find a GSSCredential on the subject later on. To accomplish this, first I needed to check if there was already a GSSCred on the subject, and if it's not already there, then we do call SubjectHelper.getGSSCredentialFromSubject(subject); on line 200 and add that GSSCredential to the subject.
